data.actual_result: SOME channels aren't hidden while Category is collapsed.
data.expected_result: Channels will be hidden while the category is collapsed
data.short_description: Muted channels are being displayed when a category is collapsed
data.steps_to_repro: - update to 540 - go to a guild where you have channels muted under a category (the cat itself isn't muted) - notice the arrow is > yet Muted Channels are being displayed
